subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Dominating the singles matches the way they always have, the Americans celebrated one of the most coveted wins in women’s golf yesterday, a 16-12 decision against Europe in the Solheim Cup in Halmstad, Sweden. Led by Morgan Pressel’s upset over Annika Sorenstam and Stacy Prammanasudh’s surprising win over Suzann Pettersen, the Americans went 8-3-1 in singles. They captured the Solheim Cup on foreign soil for only the second time.
